name: Max Greenfield
biography: Max Greenfield was born on September 4, 1980 in Dobbs Ferry, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for New Girl (2011), The Big Short (2015) and The Glass Castle (2017). He has been married to Tess Sanchez since August 8, 2008. They have two children.::Anonymous
trivia: Graduated from Dobbs Ferry High School in Dobbs Ferry, NY - Class of 1998.
Father, with Tess Sanchez, of daughter Lily Greenfield.
On August 24, 2015, Greenfield's wife Tess Sanchez gave birth to the couple's second child - a boy named Ozzie James Greenfield, weighing 6lbs., 12oz.
filmography: The Late Late Show with James Corden
Seth Rogen = Worst Person in the World
The New Guy on New Girl with Zooey Deschanel
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down
